title: Drugs - The Straight Facts - Cocaine (2003) (101p) [Inua].pdf
description:
Series: Drugs - The Straight Facts
Title:  Cocaine
Author: Heather Lehr Wagner
Publisher: Chelsea House Publishers
ISBN-10: 0791072606
ISBN-13: 978-0791072608


Drugs are everywhere--on our streets, in our homes, and in our schools--but straight facts about drugs are not. Drugs: The Straight Facts fills this void with candid discussions that emphasize a historical and scientific approach to learning about drugs, their use, and their effect on the user's health. A comprehensive guide to the second most commonly used illicit drug. This book provides a historical perspective on cocaine and the evolving public views on its use
